document_data.name: Xulbraddon Ahmaer
document_data.mainbody: '''Xulbraddon Ahmaer''' was a powerful [[wizard]] who lived in [[Elversult]] in [[1358 DR]].
document_data.Description: This mysterious [[wizard]] was bald and his dusky skin hinted at his [[South Faerûn|southern]] heritage.
document_data.Activities: Many of the spells Xulbraddon cast where unknown in the [[Interior Faerûn|Inner Sea lands]]. He was also known to have dealings with [[elemental]]s.
